mutants.code:
from collections import Counter
import operator

def minSetSize(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    freq = dict(Counter(arr))
    freq = sorted(freq.items(), key=operator.itemgetter(1), reverse=True)
    size = sum((v for (k, v) in freq))
    count = 1
    for (k, v) in freq:
        if size > n // 4:
            size -= v
            count += 1
        else:
            break
    return count

    count = -1

            size -= v
            count += 1
        else:
            break
    return count
